text: Ia nan akamra gɨn ghuava egha osɨmtɨzir ia bativiba ia dar aven tugha gavgavighavɨra iti. Kamagh amizɨ, kɨ ian ganam. God gɨn nguazimɨn itir gumazamiziba bar, men nɨghnɨzir gavgavim tuisɨgh egh foghasa, a gavgafiz, o puvatɨ, eghtɨ kamaghɨn osɨmtɨzir ekiamɨn dughiam otogham. Eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn kɨ ian gantɨ ia deragham.
